notes: Crashes before, or on the menu, some times with a popup "Fatal Error". Sometimes it will start but then crashes in the opening cut scene.
title: Life is Strange 2

notes: Sound crashes before entire game crashes within 1-5 minutes. PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command% and Steam Offline did not help.
title: Life is Strange 2

notes: The game starts fine but crashes after some minutes, no matter what you do (stay in the menu, start the game, open settings, ...). Interestingly I could play through the whole first episode using the latest wine-staging, so I assume it will begin to work with Proton once wine gets updated in Proton. Most likely this is an issue with Denuvo. The same happens with The Awesome Adventures Of Captain Spirit (same engine, same DRM).
title: Life is Strange 2

notes: game crashes randomly after short time. but wine-staging + dxvk works good
title: Life is Strange 2

notes: Booted up fine, played some lovely music, menu loading... crash to desktop.
title: Life is Strange 2

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 570 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.12-94.current, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: It´s "Denuvo Anti-tamper" only the newer "Wine-Staging" versions can handle that so runs very well on lutris with dxvk
title: Life is Strange 2

notes: Crashes a couple minutes in on Steam Play due to Denuvo, but I was able to play the entirety of the game using Lutris (DXVK+wine-staging) with very decent performance. https://lutris.net/games/the-awesome-adventures-of-captain-spirit/
title: Life is Strange 2
